gen:link.msg:message: BR-OCW-JRK.B.1: Financial statements type indication is required.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.2: Item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' is limited to values ‘Enkelvoudig’ (Separate) and ‘Geconsolideerd en enkelvoudig’ (Consolidated and separate).
BR-OCW-JRK.B.3: Authority number is required.
BR-OCW-JRK.B.4: Statutory name of entity is required.
BR-OCW-JRK.B.5: Legal form of entity is required.
BR-OCW-JRK.B.6: Chamber of commerce registration number is required.
BR-OCW-JRK.B.7: Sector is required.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.8: A value in heading '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' is required when reporting under educational sectors PO or VO.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.9: A value in heading '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' is required when reporting under educational sectors PO or VO.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.10: A value in heading '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' is required when reporting under educational sectors PO or VO.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.11: Item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' is required if 'Sector' has value 'Scientific education' (WO).

BR-OCW-JRK.B.12: Item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' must be greater than zero if 'Finances of medical faculty related to university hospital included?' has value 'Yes'.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.13: Item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' must be greater than zero if 'Finances of medical faculty related to university hospital included?' has value 'Yes'.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.14: Neither or both start date in '{xfi:concept-label($startdateQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' and end date in '{xfi:concept-label($enddateQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' must be supplied and if supplied the start date must lie before the end date and the period must be different from 01-01-2016 - 31-12-2016.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.15: The start date in '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' must lie after January 1 of the previous reporting year and before December 31 of the current reporting year.
BR-OCW-JRK.B.16: The end date in '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' must lie within the current reporting year.
BR-OCW-JRK.B.17: Statutory address is required.
BR-OCW-JRK.B.18: Postal address is required.
BR-OCW-JRK.B.19: Email address of contact or administration management office is required.
BR-OCW-JRK.B.20: Entity is required to specify assets total (item '{$targetQName}').
BR-OCW-JRK.B.21: Entity is required to specify equity total (item '{$targetQName}').
BR-OCW-JRK.B.22: Entity is required to specify equity and liabilities total (item '{$targetQName}', financial statements type '{$memberQName}').

BR-OCW-JRK.B.23: Item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' specifying whether balance sheet items at year start have been adjusted, is required (item '{$targetQName}', financial statements type '{$memberQName}').

BR-OCW-JRK.B.24: Disclosure in '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' must be present in case adjustment of balance sheet items at year start has been affirmed (item '{$targetQName}', financial statements type '{$memberQName}').
BR-OCW-JRK.B.25: Entity is required to specify government contributions total (item '{$targetQName}', financial statements type '{$memberQName}').
BR-OCW-JRK.B.26: Entity is required to specify sum of results in the reporting year (item '{$targetQName}', financial statements type '{$memberQName}').
BR-OCW-JRK.B.27: Entity is required to specify increase or decrease of cash and cash equivalents (item '{$targetQName}', financial statements type '{$memberQName}').

BR-OCW-JRK.B.28: The sumtotal of maturity specifications does not correspond with balance at period end in heading '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' for context '{($target, $Mle1y_end, $Mgt1yle5y_end, $Mgt5y_end)[. instance of element()]/@contextRef}' in model 'Notes Provisions' or 'Provisions, specification'.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.29: The sumtotal of maturity specifications does not correspond with the balance at period end in heading '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' for context '{($target, $M1to5y, $Mgt5y)[. instance of element()]/@contextRef}' in model 'Notes Non-current liabilities' or 'Non-current liabilities, specification'.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.30: Item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' in context '{($target, $anchor)[. instance of element()]/@contextRef}' is required in case the end balance of the non-current liability is non-zero.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.31: Item value for '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' in context '{$target/@contextRef}' must not be less than 0 and not greater dan 100.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.32: The date in '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' must lie after the end of the reporting period if balance at period end is greather than zero for context '{($target, $EndBalance)[. instance of element()]/@contextRef}'.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.33: A value in heading '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' for '{xfi:concept-label(($anchor, $target)[. instance of element()][1]/..,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' is required in case interest rate risk is covered.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.34: The values in models 'Balance' and 'Segment reporting' must correspond for the heading '{if($target) then xfi:concept-label(QName(namespace-uri($target),local-name($target)),'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en') else if($compare) then xfi:concept-label(QName(namespace-uri($compare[1]),local-name($compare[1])),'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en') else ''}'.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.35: Current year actual in model 'Income statement' and the total in model 'Segment reporting' must correspond for the heading '{if($target) then xfi:concept-label(QName(namespace-uri($target),local-name($target)),'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en') else if($compare) then xfi:concept-label(QName(namespace-uri($compare[1]),local-name($compare[1])),'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en') else ''}'.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.36: A value in heading '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' for '{xfi:concept-label(($anchor, $target)[. instance of element()][1]/..,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' is required in case the related party is not an association or foundation.
BR-OCW-JRK.B.37: Indication of major investments or fully progressed decentralisation is required (item '{$targetQName}', financial statements type '{$memberQName}').

BR-OCW-JRK.B.38: Item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' (item '{$targetQName}') for '{xfi:concept-label($memberQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' (member '{$memberQName}') is required for educational sectors HBO and WO.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.39: Estimates item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' (item '{$targetQName}') for current reporting year and financial statements type '{xfi:concept-label($memberQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' must be supplied with a value other than zero.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.40: Item '{xfi:concept-label($anchorQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' with value 'Besloten vennootschap' (Private limited company) or 'Naamloze vennootschap' (Limited liability company) for a controlling interest implies that the value for item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' must be greater than 50% (in relation to context: {($target, $anchor)[. instance of element()]/@contextRef}).

BR-OCW-JRK.B.41: Item '{xfi:concept-label($anchorQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' with value 'Besloten vennootschap' (Private limited company) or 'Naamloze vennootschap' (Limited liability company) for a non-controlling interest implies that the value for item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' must be 50% or less (in relation to context: {($target, $anchor)[. instance of element()]/@contextRef}).

BR-OCW-JRK.B.42: At least one of the following activities needs to be supplied to characterize the relationship with a related party: {string-join((for $d in $targetQNames return concat('''', xfi:concept-label($d,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en'),''' (',$d,')')), ', ')} (in relation to context: {$anchors/@contextRef}).

BR-OCW-JRK.B.43: The forecast for year 2020 is mandatory if '{xfi:concept-label($indicationQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' has been affirmed, in which case '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' must be supplied with a value greater than zero for financial statements type '{xfi:concept-label($memberQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}'.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.43: The forecast for year 2021 is mandatory if '{xfi:concept-label($indicationQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' has been affirmed, in which case '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' must be supplied with a value greater than zero for financial statements type '{xfi:concept-label($memberQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}'.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.44: The forecast for year 2020 is mandatory if '{xfi:concept-label($indicationQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' in model 'CP Indicators' has been affirmed, in which case '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' must be supplied with a value greater than zero for financial statements type '{xfi:concept-label($memberQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}'.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.44: The forecast for year 2021 is mandatory if '{xfi:concept-label($indicationQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' in model 'CP Indicators' has been affirmed, in which case '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' must be supplied with a value greater than zero for financial statements type '{xfi:concept-label($memberQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}'.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.45: The forecast for year 2020 is mandatory if '{xfi:concept-label($indicationQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' in model 'CP Indicators' has been affirmed, in which case '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' must be supplied with a value greater than zero for financial statements type '{xfi:concept-label($memberQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}'.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.45: The forecast for year 2021 is mandatory if '{xfi:concept-label($indicationQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' in model 'CP Indicators' has been affirmed, in which case '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' must be supplied with a value greater than zero for financial statements type '{xfi:concept-label($memberQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}'.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.46: Disclosure in item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' must be supplied if one of the following items has a value other than zero: {string-join((for $d in $discrepancyItemQNames return concat('''', xfi:concept-label($d,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en'),''' (',$d,')')), ', ')} (in relation to context(s): {string-join(distinct-values((for $d in $discrepancyItems return $d/@contextRef)), ', ')}).
BR-OCW-JRK.B.47: The name of the audit firm is required.
BR-OCW-JRK.B.48: The name of the auditor is required.

BR-OCW-JRK.B.100: Item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' (item '{$targetQName}') for '{xfi:concept-label($tdQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' is required (for typed dimension '{$tdQName}' in relation to context(s): {string-join(distinct-values((for $d in $anchors return $d/@contextRef)), ', ')}).

BR-OCW-JRK.B.101: Item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' (item '{$targetQName}') for '{xfi:concept-label($tdQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' is required (for typed dimension '{$tdQName}' in relation to context(s): {string-join(distinct-values((for $d in $anchors return $d/@contextRef)), ', ')}).

BR-OCW-JRK.B.102: Item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' (item '{$targetQName}') for '{xfi:concept-label($tdQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' is required (for typed dimension '{$tdQName}' in relation to context(s): {string-join(distinct-values((for $d in $anchors return $d/@contextRef)), ', ')}).

BR-OCW-JRK.B.103: Item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' (item '{$targetQName}') for '{xfi:concept-label($memberQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' is required (for typed dimension '{$tdQName}' and member '{$memberQName}' in relation to context(s): {string-join(distinct-values((for $d in $anchors return $d/@contextRef)), ', ')}).

BR-OCW-JRK.B.104: Item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' (item '{$targetQName}') for '{xfi:concept-label($memberQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' is required (for typed dimension '{$tdQName}' and member '{$memberQName}' in relation to context(s): {string-join(distinct-values((for $d in $anchors return $d/@contextRef)), ', ')}).

BR-OCW-JRK.B.105: Item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' (item '{$targetQName}') for '{xfi:concept-label($memberQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' is required (for typed dimension '{$tdQName}' and member '{$memberQName}' in relation to context(s): {string-join(distinct-values((for $d in $anchors return $d/@contextRef)), ', ')}).

BR-OCW-JRK.B.106: Item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' (item '{$targetQName}') for '{xfi:concept-label($memberQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' is required (for typed dimension '{$tdQName}' and member '{$memberQName}' in relation to context(s): {string-join(distinct-values((for $d in $anchors return $d/@contextRef)), ', ')}).

BR-OCW-JRK.B.107: Item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' (item '{$targetQName}') for '{xfi:concept-label($memberQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' is required (for typed dimension '{$tdQName}' and member '{$memberQName}' in relation to context(s): {string-join(distinct-values((for $d in $anchors return $d/@contextRef)), ', ')}).

BR-OCW-JRK.B.108: Item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' (item '{$targetQName}') for '{xfi:concept-label($memberQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' is required (for typed dimension '{$tdQName}' and member '{$memberQName}' in relation to context(s): {string-join(distinct-values((for $d in $anchors return $d/@contextRef)), ', ')}).

BR-OCW-JRK.B.109: Item '{xfi:concept-label($targetQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' (item '{$targetQName}') for '{xfi:concept-label($tdQName,'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en')}' is required (for typed dimension '{$tdQName}' in relation to context(s): {string-join(distinct-values((for $d in $anchors return $d/@contextRef)), ', ')}).
